name: gauze
content:
Add to word list

[ U ] a very thin, light cloth, used to make clothing, to cover cuts and to separate solids from liquids, etc.: a gauze skirt a piece of sterile gauze
design56/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C or U ] a material like a net formed by wires crossing over each other: wire gauze
